item.title: Vim plugin to post blogs remotely
item.description: I uses wordpress as my private website while still struggling on finding different tools to write blogs remotely. I tried different tools including wordpress electron app here and vscode with extension “markdown-mail”, still gets no luck. Wordpress desktop app is easy to setup and use, but it does not support markdown edit and preview, kind of disappoint. Markdown-mail is an extension published on vscode marketplace, I have tried it but gets no luck, it could not send my markdown doc to wordpress via email address.
